alert.note: Alert for Lamar; Pike; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 3:16PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Pike, eastern Upson and southern Lamar Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 316 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Atwater, or near Zebulon, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Thomaston, Barnesville, Zebulon, Yatesville, Meansville, Aldora, Lincoln Park, The Rock, Sunset Village, Atwater, Lifsey Springs, Redbone Crossroads, Redbone, Logtown, Hannahs Mill and Piedmont. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
